text:
- AWS Partner Systems
mainly use with partners.

They kind of match
partners with customers.

- The portal is the main
website for AWS partners.

My team manages that system to
build customer-facing futures

that help our customers manage
their relationship with AWS.

- Our partners is spread
all over the world

from small companies to
various large scale companies

trying to build AWS services
for their customers.
That data gets into our partner network

and the internal team will
work on those opportunities,

and then the partners will
implement those services
for their customers.

- As AWS grows the data that
they handle would also grows
and especially me being a data engineer,

I gotta work with new
products and new services
where we can handle large volumes of data
and also explore new technologies.

- A very important part
of what we are building
is to collect feedback from customers,

because everything that we're
doing is for the customers.

- Since we have the
customer reason in mind,

we don't have a lot of
other things to worry about.

If we have customer obsessed,
that is all we need.

- Over my time on this team,
I've had the opportunity
to build a solution for our partners

using services like
Amazon SES, for example,
or Lambda, Amazon Gateway.
So I think that learning culture, too,

is one of the reasons why
I've stayed this long at AWS,
but AWS, the sky, it really is limit.

- AWS partner network
team is the place to be.
(upbeat music)
